title: Backup pull requests
description:
Backup information about pull request in repository.
Should be save in dir pull-requests in `{pull_requests_id}.json` file with format:
```
{
    "description": "example",
    "creation date": "2022-09-06",
    "creator_login": "creator",
    "status": "open",
    "assignee_login": "assignee"
    "from_branch": "from",
    "to_branch": "to",
    "comments": 
        [
            {
                "comment": "text",
                "creation date": "2022-09-09"
                "creator_login": "creator"
            }
         ]
}
```

**Think about commits and changes in future**
